title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with bayoneted musket] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with bayoneted musket] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 11.9 x 9.5 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather, floral and scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
